name: luc-de-zen-on
description: Build a personal website, blog, or portfolio with Astro.

scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && npm run deploy && npm run deploy:workflows
scripts.validate:workflows: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const files = fs.readdirSync('workflows'); files.forEach(file => { if(file.endsWith('.json')) { try { JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('workflows/'+file, 'utf8')); console.log('✅', file); } catch(e) { console.error('❌', file, e.message); process.exit(1); } } })"
scripts.test:api-keys: node -e "import('./src/utils/loadEnv.js').then(m => { m.validateRequiredKeys(); console.log('✅ API Keys validation completed'); }).catch(e => { console.error('❌ API Keys error:', e.message); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.automation:setup: npm install node-fetch dotenv && npm run test:api-keys && npm run validate:workflows
scripts.automation:deploy: npm run automation:setup && npm run deploy:workflows
